hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.name: process_list
hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.defaultValue: # Columns Explained: ssh_ip, ssh_port, ssh username, type, pid pattern 172.17.0.1:22:root:cmdpattern:docker.*daemon 172.17.0.1:22:root:pid:1104

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash -e function download_script() { local download_file=${1?} . /etc/profile [ -n "$DOWNLOAD_TAG_NAME" ] || export DOWNLOAD_TAG_NAME="tag_v1" working_dir="/var/lib/jenkins/code/devops_jenkins" bash_script="${working_dir}/${download_file}" dir_name=$(dirname "$bash_script")
export DOWNLOAD_PREFIX="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DennyZhang/devops_jenkins/${DOWNLOAD_TAG_NAME}" if [ ! -f "$bash_script" ]; then mkdir -p "$dir_name" wget -O "$bash_script" "${DOWNLOAD_PREFIX}/${download_file}" chmod 755 "$bash_script" fi } ################################################################################ download_file="monitor/monitor_remote_process.sh" download_script "$download_file" bash -e "/var/lib/jenkins/code/devops_jenkins/$download_file"
